message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to let it go for $80, a $20 discount from the market price. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with this exceptional item.
I'm not convinced by the discount, I'd like to wait for the next offer.

I understand your skepticism, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. This product is truly exceptional, and I'm offering it to you for $90, a $30 discount from the market price. I'm confident you won't find a better deal on a high-quality product like this anywhere else.
I'll take the offer, thank you Alice!

You won't regret this one! I'm offering this high-quality product to you for $100, the same price as the market value. I'm not looking to make a profit on this one, I just want to make sure it finds a good home. Will you take it?
I'm not going to pay full price, I'll wait for a better offer.

I understand you're a savvy buyer, but I'm willing to throw in a premium warranty that's worth $20 on top of the product's value. This way, you'll get the full $120 value of the product, plus an extra $20 for peace of mind. It's a one-time offer, and I think it's a great deal.
That's a great offer, I'll take it!

I'm glad you liked the previous offer! This time, I'll give you a choice: I'll sell you this high-quality product for $90, or I'll let you inspect it for 5 minutes before deciding. If you decide not to buy, I'll give you a full refund. What would you prefer?
I'll take the inspection option, thank you!

I'm glad you decided to inspect the product. Now that you've had a chance to see it up close, I'll give you an even better offer. I'll sell it to you for $95, and I'll also throw in a free accessory that complements the product perfectly. It's a $25 value, absolutely free. What do you say?
I'll take the offer, thank you Alice!

You've been a great customer so far! I'm willing to offer you a special deal on this high-quality product. If you buy it now, I'll give you a 10% discount, which brings the price down to $90. But here's the twist: if you decide to buy this product, I'll give you a guarantee that the next product I offer you will be at least 50% off the market price. What do you think?
I'll take the offer, thank you Alice!

I'm glad you took advantage of the deal! Now, I'll let you in on a little secret: I've been holding back on the best product of the batch. This one is truly exceptional, and I'm willing to let it go for $110, a $10 discount from the market price. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to put my reputation on the line to make this sale happen.

I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'll make you a counteroffer: I'll sell you this high-quality product for $100, and I'll throw in a second product of equal or lesser value for free. You'll get two products for the price of one, and I'll still make a profit. It's a one-time offer, and I think it's a great deal.
That's a great offer, I'll take it!

I'll sell it to you for $85, and I'll also give you a personalized thank-you gift worth $15. It's a unique item that shows my appreciation for your business, and it's only available to customers like you.

I'll make an offer of $95, Alice. Let's discuss it.
I like your negotiating style! I'm willing to meet you at $97.50, which is $2.50 below your offer. I think it's a fair price, and I'm confident you'll love this high-quality product. What do you say?
I'll think about it, Alice. Can I get back to you?

Take your time, I'm not going anywhere! In fact, I'll sweeten the deal even more.
